headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS IONIZATION GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Ionization Gauge Controller      The Granville Phillips 330 Ionization Gauge Controller measures pressure from less than 1 x10 -10  to 1 x 10 -1  torr from  a single ionization gauge and displays pressure readout via a front panel display and analog output. The 3 1/2" high modular  controller is available as a bench mount or space saving half-rack unit.  This used ionization gauge controller will be fully refurbished and will meet Granville Phillip's performance specifications. It is sold with our ninety day warranty.
